page.description: Converts a date string to an RFC 1123 formatted date (Day, dd Month yyyy hh:mm:ss TIMEZONE)

prototypes.prototype: Formatted_Date_Time as C = A5_RFC1123DATE( Character_Date as C )
Formatted_Date_Time as C = A5_RFC1123DATE( Time_Date_Value as T )

argument.name: Formatted_Date_Time
argument.description: A date time value in the format: "Day, dd Mon yyyy hh:mm:ss GMT " ("Tue, 30 Mar 2004 14:17:02 GMT")

argument.name: Character_Date
argument.description: A date time value formatted "mm/dd/yyyy 0h:0m:0s am".

page.discussion: The A5_RFC1123DATE() function takes a date, either as a time or character, and converts it to a string following the RFC 1123 format.
page.example: dim t as T t = now() ? a5_rfc1123date(t) = "Tue, 30 Mar 2004 16:17:55 GMT"
